WRITING.TITLE: Guide: How to reduce Lag and remove Freezes
WRITING.TEXT: Rightclick on Worlds Adrift - gt; properties - gt; Set Launch Options- gt; copy paste: "-high -USEALLAVAILABLECORES -maxMem=XXXX -malloc=system -force-feature-level-11-0 -force-d3d11" replace: XXXX depends on your RAM in MB: 4 GB = 4096 6 GB = 6144 8 GB = 8192 12 GB = 12288 16 GB = 16384 24 GB = 24576 32 GB = 32768 64 GB = 65536 Now dont get me wrong, the game will still lag from time to time. But for me, it removed those devastating 5-15 second freezes, that I had each time I went to a new island or respawned. Try it out and share results
opening and closing probably is going to be a lot of fun. maybe they should add a keybind for Sails when in Helm

There are some islands ,but no ships. why would there be if you can fly anywhere? There are some Trinkets that only can be lootet, for speed and damage buff, but they are not important. Trinkets for Crit. manareg. healreg. and amour can be crafted. Gear that you loot is the same as crafted ones but usally with higher lvl requierments and worse stats. best to craft the gear yourself, which is unlock from the skill tree. Currently all servers have the exact same World. Exploring the world is fun. yes you can cheese mob while fly, but it takes more mana pots, which you have to farm first.
